question: holes after you pop a pimple/zit?
question_content:
hi, can anybody help me ? 
you know after you have a pimple it kind of leaves a scar of a small indent on your face.
does anybody know how you can heal or at least make those holes less noticeable ??
im a guy so dont suggest make up

answers.answer_content:
Holes appear when the contents have oozed out. Fill up with antibiotic and let it be. It will eventually heal itself. There are ways to deal with acne before they erupt and make holes.

Niacinamide face cleansing pads are effective and simple way to keep acne away. Just place a pad on the pimple and watch it fade away. Lavender Oil helps prevent skin drying.
Niacinamide pads are also known as Vitamin B3 pads or Nicotinamide pads. Works on body acne too.
Give them a try and you will be pleasantly surprised.

1.  Use steam to open up your pores. (boil some water, put a towel over your head or take a shower)
2. Put some sort of moisturiser on it (rub it in nicely)
3. Use cold water to close up your pores (splash some freezing water on or dip your face in cold water)
This will replace that hole with moisturiser and soothe the redness.
